resources.string: Currency converter application that converts Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) into foreign currency

The currency conversion application is an application that helps convert Rupiah (IDR) into foreign currencies such as American Dollars (USD), Euros (EUR), Ringgit (MYR), Yen (JPY), and Singapore Dollars (SGD). 

This application was created for Assessment 1 of Mobpro 1 Course
